original_title: UFC Fight Night 204: Volkov vs. Aspinall
overview: UFC Fight Night 204: Volkov vs. Aspinall was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that took place on March 19, 2022 at The O2 Arena in London, England. A heavyweight bout between former Bellator Heavyweight World Champion Alexander Volkov and Tom Aspinall headlined the event.
title: UFC Fight Night 204: Volkov vs. Aspinall
